column5: We were out fishing Oct 15-13 from Baie Du Dore & saw 1 boat fishing Bruce A as we headed out to fish & no-one else was around, it was the best day we had on the Lake this year & my 1st Salmon of the year, we waited around long enough to let the fish get Measured, Weighed & scales taken after we loaded the Boat.Tight Lines SBK  http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2013/11/bruce-power-sampling-salmon-trout-at.html
